text: (Aey Nabi), jin logon ko humne pehle kitab di thi woh is kitab se jo humne tumpar nazil ki hai khush hain aur mukhtalif girohon mein kuch log aisey bhi hain jo iski baaz baaton ko nahin maante. Tum saaf kehdo ke “mujhey to sirf Allah ki bandagi ka hukum diya gaya hai aur issey mana kiya gaya hai ke kisi ko uske saath shareek thehraoon, lihaza main usi ki taraf dawat deta hoon aur usi ki taraf mera rujoo hai (myself turn to Him)”
